text: allaah nabee par meharabaan ho gaya aur muhaajiron aur anasaar par bhee, jinhonne tangee kee ghadee mein usaka saath diya, isake pashchaat ki unamen se ek giroh ke dil kutilata kee or jhuk gae the. phir usane unapar daya-drshti darshaee. nissandeh, vah unake lie atyant karunaamay, dayaavaan hai
